name: iot-webinterface
description: web interface for "iot-monolith" using web-components written with the goal of having absolutely no build-process.

scripts.build:clean:serve: npm run --silent clear:build && tsc-watch --build tsconfig.json src/workers/tsconfig.json --watch --onSuccess "npm run --silent pack:all"
scripts.build:clean:watch: npm run --silent clear:build && tsc-watch --build tsconfig.json src/workers/tsconfig.json --watch --onSuccess "npm run --silent pack:transform"
scripts.build:clean: npm run --silent clear:build && npm run --silent tsc && npm run --silent pack:transform
scripts.build:serve: npm run --silent clear && tsc-watch --build tsconfig.json src/workers/tsconfig.json --watch --onSuccess "npm run --silent pack:all"
scripts.build:watch: npm run --silent clear && tsc-watch --build tsconfig.json src/workers/tsconfig.json --watch --onSuccess "npm run --silent pack:transform"
scripts.build: npm run --silent clear && npm run --silent tsc && npm run --silent pack:transform
scripts.lint:ts-only: tsc --project tsconfig.json --noEmit; tsc --project src/workers/tsconfig.json --noEmit; eslint --ext ts,tsx src
scripts.lint: tsc --project tsconfig.json --noEmit; tsc --project src/workers/tsconfig.json --noEmit; eslint --ext js,jsx,ts,tsx src
scripts.push: git push origin HEAD --force && git push github HEAD --force

author: Lennart Pelz <mail@mrpelz.de>
